mathematica: f[n_] := Block[{k = 1, s = 0, l = Max[2, Floor[ Log[2, n + 1] + 2]]}, While[k < l, If[ Mod[n + k, 2^k] == 0, s = s + 2^(k - 1)]; k++ ]; s]; Table[ f[n], {n, 0, 103}] (* _Robert G. Wilson v_, Mar 18 2005 *)
program: def a102370(n): return 0 if n<1 else sum([(n + k)&(2**k) for k in range(len(bin(n)[2:]) + 1)])
def a(n): return (a102370(n) - n)/2 # _Indranil Ghosh_, May 03 2017
